overview: Liam started his business career with NCB in 1986. Prior to this he studied Business Studies in Trinity College Dublin and qualified as a chartered accountant in Coopers and Lybrand. Over the past 18 years he has accumulated a wealth of experience from the senior management positions he has held in investment banking and industry. Prior to re-joining NCB Corporate Finance as Managing Director Liam was a Director of Key Capital, the specialist corporate finance and capital markets advisory boutique. From 2000 to 2002 Liam was Chief Financial Officer of Datalex plc and from 1996 to 2000 he was Head of Corporate Finance at Goodbody Stockbrokers. Liam served as a non-executive director of Irish Continental Group plc from 1987 to 2004.
